sourcesContent:
import { Box, Button, CloseButton, Heading, HStack, NumberDecrementStepper, NumberIncrementStepper, NumberInput, NumberInputField, NumberInputStepper, Wrap, WrapItem } from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";

export const PlateWindow = (props) => {

	const {_id,
		imgURL,
		name,
		description,
		price} = props.item


	
	
	
	
	
	
	

  return (
    <>
      <Box
        as={motion.div}
        position="fixed"
        bg="rgba(255,255,255,0.5)"
        w="100%"
        h="100%"
        top="0"
        left="0"
        onClick={() => props.setSelectedItem(null)}
        transition={{ duration: 2 }}
      />
      <Box
        as={motion.div}
        position="fixed"
        top={0}
        boxShadow="dark-lg"
        rounded="xl"
        padding="3"
        bg="white"
        animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
        initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      >
        <Box>
          <CloseButton onClick={() => props.setSelectedItem(null)} />
          <Wrap spacing={10} margin="2">
            <Box>
              <WrapItem as={motion.div} layoutId={_id}>
                <Image as={motion.img} src={imgURL} rounded="xl" />
              </WrapItem>
            </Box>
            <Box margin="4">
              <Box as={motion.div} layoutId={name}>
                <Heading size="lg">{name}</Heading>
              </Box>
              <Text marginTop={10}>{description}</Text>
              <Box as={motion.div}>
                <Heading size="md">${price}</Heading>
              </Box>
              <HStack marginTop={20}>
                <NumberInput size="lg" maxW={32} defaultValue={1} min={1}>
                  <NumberInputField />
                  <NumberInputStepper>
                    <NumberIncrementStepper />
                    <NumberDecrementStepper />
                  </NumberInputStepper>
                </NumberInput>
                <Input placeholder="Pedido especial?" size="lg" />
                <Button
                  colorScheme="blue"
                  size="lg"
                  onClick={addToShoppingCart}
                >
                  Pedir
                </Button>
              </HStack>
            </Box>
          </Wrap>
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </>
  );
};
